title: Simultaneous detection of hydroquinone and catechol by Cu/Bi-MOF-derived Cu/Bi@C nanocomposites
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, 8,2280-2291
DOI: 10.1039/D3SE01577G, Paper
Yuting Wu, Keru Cao, Jun Yan, Yuheng Zhang, Biao Zhang, Yanan Wang, Yong Yang, Dacheng Zhou, Qi Wang, ChunXia Liu
Principle of electrochemical sensor: under the action of Cu/Bi@C, HQ and CC molecules interact with nitrogen and oxygen atoms and are oxidised to 1,4-benzoquinone and 1,2-benzoquinone, releasing two electrons and protons at the same time.
